message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, I'm aiming for a price closer to $19,000. This product offers exceptional value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $19,000 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $18,000. This is my final offer, as I'm happy to go with John's deal if it doesn't work out.
